snippet: A man at court with family members opened fire outside the Jefferson County Courthouse in Beaumont on Wednesday, killing one person and wounding at least three others, the police said.
abstract: Unidentified man opens fire outside Jefferson Country Courthouse in Beaumont, Tex, killing one person and wounding at least three others.
lead_paragraph: A man at court with family members opened fire outside the Jefferson County Courthouse in Beaumont on Wednesday, killing one person and wounding at least three others, the police said.

headline.main: Texas: Gunman Opens Fire Outside Court in Beaumont
headline.print_headline: Texas: Gunman Opens Fire Outside Court In Beaumont
